dict.string:
# this command allows you to search # the TextMate mailing list archive
res=$(CocoaDialog inputbox \ --title "Search the TextMate Mailing List" \ --informative-text "What would you like to search for?" \ --button1 "Search Archive" --button2 "Cancel")
[[ $(head -n1 <<<"$res") == "2" ]] && exit_discard search_term=$(tail -n1 <<<"$res")
. "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/html.sh" redirect "http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&c2coff=1&as_sitesearch=lists.macromates.com&as_q=${search_term// /+}"
